resources.string: The goal of this game is to kill the foe shogun. To do so, each player got 8 pawn (including its shogun) wich can move from 1 to 4 cases. After each move, the number of move possible is changing. 1 > 2 2 > 3 3 > 4 4 > 1 Each move can be made horizontal of vertical, no "jump" is possible. Remember that this app is an exercice, my first Android application.
